Uses of Interface
icap.core.Icap

Packages that use Icap
icap Overall ICAP package. 
icap.core Core ICAP processing features: statics, protocol parser and abstraction layer for fast services development 
icap.services ICAP Services implementation. 
 

Uses of Icap in icap
 

Classes in icap that implement Icap
 class IcapServer
          Main application class, launch ICAP servers.
Parse configuration file, configure and instantiate the requested services.
Each service is run with its own port and server socket.
 

Uses of Icap in icap.core
 

Classes in icap.core that implement Icap
 class AbstractService
          Abstract class silently providing all ICAP protocol parsing methods for both REQ and RESPMODE
Services implementation must just provide getResponse() and getOptions() methods
 class IcapParser
          ICAP protocol parser.
Determine ICAP request type (OPTIONS/REQMOD/RESPMOD), parse ICAP request and embedded HTTP messages for REQMOD and RESPMOD.
 

Uses of Icap in icap.services
 

Classes in icap.services that implement Icap
 class ContextCompress
           ContextCompress szolgaltatas a GreasySpoon ICAP szerverhez.
 class EchoService
           Simple ICAP REQMOD and RESPMOD Echo Service
 class GreasySpoon
           GreasySpoon service for both Request and Response mode
 class PreviewService
           Simple ICAP RESPMOD Echo Service using Preview
